sentenceList.question: 그의손은 깨끗한거과 거리가 멀다.(깨끗하지 않다)
sentenceList.answer: His hands were far from clean.

sentenceList.question: 그녀는 막 서울에서 돌아왔다
sentenceList.answer: She has just returned from Seoul.

sentenceList.question: 그녀는 주로 어디에서 노니?
sentenceList.answer: Where does she usally hang out?

sentenceList.question: 너는 오직 그일에서 빠져나가려고 하고 있잖아.
sentenceList.answer: You are just trying to get out of the work.

sentenceList.question: 시간 다 썻네. 나 시간 다 됬어.
sentenceList.answer: I have run out of time.

sentenceList.question: 회의는 다음주 금요일로 연기되었다.
sentenceList.answer: The meeting was put off to next Friday.

sentenceList.question: 그들은 끝까지 충실했다.
sentenceList.answer: They were faithful to the end.

sentenceList.question: 버터는 우유로 부터 만들어진다.
sentenceList.answer: Butter is made out of milk.
